summary: A button widget which hosts a menu or starts a command.
name: awful.widget.launcher

map.args.image: The image to display on the launcher button (refer to `wibox.widget.imagebox`).
map.args.menu: Table of items to create a menu based on `awful.menu`.
map.args.command: Command to run on user click.

items.description:
**NOTE**: You need either command or menu argument for widget to create
 successfully
items.summary: Create a button widget which will launch a command.
items.name: awful.widget.launcher
